refnamediv.refpurpose: Evalstrs evaluates a string containing Csound code, returning a value.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Evalstr compiles and runs Csound code and returns a value from the global space (instr 0). This opcode can be also used to compile new instruments (as compilestr).

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Scode -- a string to be compiled and evaluated.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ktrig -- triggers the compilation/evaluation if non-zero.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the evalstr opcode in conjunction with return:
ival evalstr "return 2 + 2" print ival
